text: Ara upasana kare allahake bada diye emana bastura, ya na tadera kona ksatisadhana karate pare, na labha ebam bale, era to allahara kache amadera suparisakari. Tumi bala, tomara ki allahake emana bisaye abahita karacha, ye samparke tini abahita nana asamana o yaminera majhe? Tini putahpabitra o mahana se samasta theke yake tomara sarika karacha.
